pr_title: HBASE-24653 Show snapshot owner on Master WebUI

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to also check if it is 0 and display FOREVER as done in snapshotsStats.jsp?
timeline.author: HorizonNet
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -673,6 +675,8 @@ AssignmentManager assignmentManager = master.getAssignmentManager(); <% snapshotTable.getNameAsString() %> <% new Date(snapshotDesc.getCreationTime()) %> + <% snapshotDesc.getOwner() %> + <% snapshotDesc.getTtl() %>

replies.bodyText: human readable TTL? or use TTL(Seconds)?
replies.author: infraio

replies.bodyText: I think human readable would be better.
replies.author: HorizonNet

timeline.message: HBASE-24653 Show snapshot owner on Master WebUI
